title: US Ambassador Eric Garcetti hails Adani's Khavda renewable energy project
description: US Ambassador to India Eric Garcetti visited Adani Group's Khavda renewable energy project, showcasing support for the conglomerate. Adani Greens is developing the world's largest 30,000 MW project in Gujarat, a project that has drawn global attention. Garcetti's visit is being seen as a positive sign for the Indian conglomerate's reputation in the US post the Hindenburg controversy.
